Name: authenticate
Description: Authenticate as a user with Auth0 integration

Name: whoami
Description: Check who you are currently operating as

Name: demoPassword
Description: the user's password

Name: bodyData
Description: Raw data provided

Name: bodyFile
Description: Path to file to use

Name: runas
Description: Who to run as

Name: amqps
Description: AMQPS Connection String

Name: where
Description: Limit the where clause

Name: output
Description: Output file name

Name: help
Description: Get help on a given topic

Name: action
Description: The specific command to execute.

Name: maxpages
Description: Maximum number of pages to return in the results

Name: view
Description: Which view in the data source to pull data from.

Name: apikey
Description: Airtable API key to use for requests.

Name: baseid
Description: ID of Airtable base you're querying.

Name: projectname
Description: Name of project that is being used will be saved with the Airtable credentials.

Name: makeDefault
Description: Flag to set the email+apikey as default

Name: emailAddress
Description: User's email address

Name: listStageInfo
Description: Lists the project's available stages

Name: stage
Description: A stage for the project

Name: startServer
Description: Start http://localhost:4242 server to respond to services

Name: restEndpoint
Description: The http REST endpoint to connect to in order to get data
